urls.title: Digital Medicine Leader Akili to List on Nasdaq Following Successful Business Combination with Social Capital Suvretta Holdings Corp. I
urls.description: Digital Medicine Leader Akili to List on Nasdaq Following Successful Business Combination with Social Capital Suvretta Holdings Corp. I

data.text:
Up next: Q4 commercial launch of Akili’s first product, EndeavorRx

Later: potentially bringing EndeavorRx to broader ADHD populations, and expanding to new disease areas (depression, autism, MS, Covid brain fog, etc.) /7

This can be a great new option for many families. It significantly broadens access and is a viable treatment option, especially with many parents hesitant to put their kids on drugs (like a Schedule II controlled substance) which can have limiting side effects themselves /6

Like working out a specific muscle at the gym, EndeavorRx is designed to target key neural systems in the brain related to attention. But because it’s software, the treatment can adapt the gameplay in real-time to maintain a consistent level of difficulty for each patient /5

Their first product (EndeavorRx) will launch in Q4. It’s a first-of-its-kind, FDA-cleared, doctor-prescribed video game designed to treat inattention in pediatric ADHD, one of the most prevalent cognitive impairments among kids today /4

Full indication: https://t.co/i1exC2DfE1

urls.title: Indications, Safety & Caution | EndeavorRx®
urls.description: Learn more about the indications for use, safety and cautions for EndeavorRx®.

data.text:
Akili has pioneered an entirely new category of medicine designed to directly and safely target these issues in the brain.

Based on 10+ yrs of research and rigorous clinical tests, they combine cog. science & patented tech to deliver medicine via software on a phone or tablet /3

Today there are limited options & access to treat the cognitive issues (memory/attention/etc) associated with diseases like depression, autism, ADHD.

Treatments like therapy & pills may help mood, but don’t target cognition - which can be just as debilitating to daily life /2

I’m proud to share that $DNAA has successfully completed its deal to bring @AkiliLabs public. I am investing $100M in @EddieMartucci & the Akili team to address the growing and worsening mental health crisis in the U.S. /1
Full list: https://t.co/dwC9xaRepD

tweets.text:
Up next: Q4 commercial launch of Akili’s first product, EndeavorRx

Later: potentially bringing EndeavorRx to broader ADHD populations, and expanding to new disease areas (depression, autism, MS, Covid brain fog, etc.) /7

This can be a great new option for many families. It significantly broadens access and is a viable treatment option, especially with many parents hesitant to put their kids on drugs (like a Schedule II controlled substance) which can have limiting side effects themselves /6

Like working out a specific muscle at the gym, EndeavorRx is designed to target key neural systems in the brain related to attention. But because it’s software, the treatment can adapt the gameplay in real-time to maintain a consistent level of difficulty for each patient /5

Their first product (EndeavorRx) will launch in Q4. It’s a first-of-its-kind, FDA-cleared, doctor-prescribed video game designed to treat inattention in pediatric ADHD, one of the most prevalent cognitive impairments among kids today /4

Full indication: https://t.co/i1exC2DfE1

urls.title: Indications, Safety & Caution | EndeavorRx®
urls.description: Learn more about the indications for use, safety and cautions for EndeavorRx®.

tweets.text:
Akili has pioneered an entirely new category of medicine designed to directly and safely target these issues in the brain.

Based on 10+ yrs of research and rigorous clinical tests, they combine cog. science & patented tech to deliver medicine via software on a phone or tablet /3

Today there are limited options & access to treat the cognitive issues (memory/attention/etc) associated with diseases like depression, autism, ADHD.

Treatments like therapy & pills may help mood, but don’t target cognition - which can be just as debilitating to daily life /2

I’m proud to share that $DNAA has successfully completed its deal to bring @AkiliLabs public. I am investing $100M in @EddieMartucci & the Akili team to address the growing and worsening mental health crisis in the U.S. /1
https://t.co/pcz1tAIJ1B
